title: Software Engineer
description: Working as a Software Engineer in the Data Plane team.
Developed the solution/POC for the new feature in the product to classfy the Xbox/PS game download traffic and successfully classifying the top games with 95+% accuracy.
Worked on integrating tensorflow model with the product. while keeping the performance in mind. (Tensorflow C, Tensorflow Lite)
Worked on multiple customer commitments with hard deadlines and successfully delivered the solution on time.

title: Software Engineer
